20101203180821.000|20101203180823.500|CCO|I APOLOGIZE FOR KEEPING YOU GUYS
20101203180823.500|20101203180826.000|CCO|UP LATE.
20101203180826.000|20101203180828.500|CCO|COMING ON SUCH SHORT NOTICE BUT 
20101203180828.500|20101203180831.000|CCO|I WANTED TO MAKE SURE THAT I 
20101203180831.000|20101203180833.500|CCO|COULD SPEND A LITTLE TIME THIS 
20101203180833.500|20101203180836.000|CCO|HOLIDAY WITH THE MEN AND WOMEN 
20101203180836.000|20101203180838.500|CCO|OF THE FINEST FIGHTING FORCE 
20101203180838.500|20101203180841.000|CCO|THAT THE WORLD HAS EVER KNOWN.
20101203180841.000|20101203180844.333|CCO|THAT'S ALL OF YOU.
20101203180844.333|20101203180847.667|CCO|I WANT TO THANK GENERAL PETRAEUS
20101203180847.667|20101203180851.000|CCO|NOT ONLY FOR THE INTRODUCTION 
20101203180851.000|20101203180854.333|CCO|AND THE T-SHIRTS BUT FOR GENERAL
20101203180854.333|20101203180857.667|CCO|PETRAEUS' LIFETIME OF SERVICE.

20101203181127.667|20101203181131.000|CCO|IS THAT WHAT I HEARD?

20101203181137.667|20101203181141.000|CCO|SERVING TOGETHER, SUCCEEDING 
20101203181141.000|20101203181143.500|CCO|TOGETHER.
20101203181143.500|20101203181146.000|CCO|EXCEPT MAYBE IN NEXT WEEK'S 
20101203181146.000|20101203181148.500|CCO|ARMY/NAVY GAME.
20101203181148.500|20101203181151.000|CCO|AS YOUR COMMANDER AND CHIEF, I 
20101203181151.000|20101203181153.500|CCO|HAVE TO STAY NEUTRAL ON THAT.

20101203181158.500|20101203181201.000|CCO|YOU KNOW, WHEN I WAS HERE IN THE
20101203181201.000|20101203181203.500|CCO|SPRING, WE HAD A COALITION OF 43

20101203181206.000|20101203181208.500|CCO|NOW, WE'VE GOT A COALITION OF 49

20101203181214.333|20101203181216.000|CCO|THAT SUPPORTS AFGHANISTAN IS 
20101203181216.000|20101203181217.667|CCO|STRONG AND IS GROWING.
20101203181217.667|20101203181219.333|CCO|NOW, I'M NOT HERE TO GIVE A LONG

20101203181221.000|20101203181223.500|CCO|I WANT TO SHAKE AS MANY HANDS AS

20101203181536.000|20101203181537.667|CCO|I KNOW SOMEBODY HAS TO DO IT.

20101203181601.000|20101203181604.333|CCO|YOU HAVE SHOWN WHY THE UNITED 
20101203181604.333|20101203181607.667|CCO|STATES MILITARY REMAINS THE MOST
20101203181607.667|20101203181611.000|CCO|TRUSTED INSTITUTION IN AMERICA.
20101203181611.000|20101203181613.000|CCO|THAT'S THE LEGACY THAT YOUR 
20101203181613.000|20101203181615.000|CCO|GENERATION HAS FORGED DURING 
20101203181615.000|20101203181617.000|CCO|THIS DECADE OF TRIAL.
20101203181617.000|20101203181619.000|CCO|IN IRAQ AND HERE IN AFGHANISTAN,
20101203181619.000|20101203181621.000|CCO|THAT'S THE LEGACY THAT YOU ARE 
20101203181621.000|20101203181623.500|CCO|CARING FORWARD.
20101203181623.500|20101203181626.000|CCO|AS GENERAL PETRAEUS MENTIONED,

20101203181628.500|20101203181631.000|CCO|ADDITIONAL TROOPS TO SERVE IN 
20101203181631.000|20101203181632.429|CCO|THIS COUNTRY THAT WAS THE 
20101203181632.429|20101203181633.857|CCO|STAGING GROUND FOR THE 9/11 
20101203181633.857|20101203181635.286|CCO|ATTACKS.
20101203181635.286|20101203181636.714|CCO|ALL OF THOSE TROOPS ARE NOW IN 
20101203181636.714|20101203181638.143|CCO|PLACE.
20101203181638.143|20101203181639.571|CCO|THANKS TO YOUR SERVICE, WE ARE 
20101203181639.571|20101203181641.000|CCO|MAKING IMPORTANT PROGRESS.
20101203181641.000|20101203181643.500|CCO|YOU ARE PROTECTING YOUR COUNTRY,
20101203181643.500|20101203181646.000|CCO|YOU ARE ACHIEVING YOUR 
20101203181646.000|20101203181648.500|CCO|OBJECTIVES.
20101203181648.500|20101203181651.000|CCO|YOU WILL SUCCEED IN YOUR 
20101203181651.000|20101203181653.000|CCO|MISSION.
20101203181653.000|20101203181655.000|CCO|WE SAID WE WERE GOING TO BREAK 
20101203181655.000|20101203181657.000|CCO|THE TALIBAN'S MOMENTUM.
20101203181657.000|20101203181659.000|CCO|THAT'S WHAT YOU ARE DOING.
20101203181659.000|20101203181701.000|CCO|YOU ARE GOING ON THE OFFENSE, 
20101203181701.000|20101203181704.333|CCO|TIRED OF PLAYING DEFENSE.
20101203181704.333|20101203181707.667|CCO|TARGETING THEIR LEADERS, PUSHING
20101203181707.667|20101203181711.000|CCO|THEM OUT OF THEIR STRONGHOLDS.
20101203181711.000|20101203181712.667|CCO|TODAY, WE CAN BE PROUD THERE ARE
20101203181712.667|20101203181714.333|CCO|FEWER AREAS UNDER TALIBAN 
20101203181714.333|20101203181716.000|CCO|CONTROL AND MORE AFGHANS HAVE A 
20101203181716.000|20101203181717.667|CCO|CHANCE TO BUILD A MORE HOPEFUL 
20101203181717.667|20101203181719.333|CCO|FUTURE.
20101203181719.333|20101203181721.000|CCO|WE SAID A YEAR AGO THAT WE ARE 
20101203181721.000|20101203181722.667|CCO|GOING TO BUILD THE CAPACITY OF 
20101203181722.667|20101203181724.333|CCO|THE AFGHAN PEOPLE.
20101203181724.333|20101203181726.000|CCO|THAT'S WHAT YOU ARE DOING, 
20101203181726.000|20101203181727.667|CCO|MEETING OUR RECRUITMENT TARGETS,
20101203181727.667|20101203181729.333|CCO|TRAINING AFGHAN FORCES, 
20101203181729.333|20101203181731.000|CCO|PARTNERING WITH THOSE AFGHANS 
20101203181731.000|20101203181733.000|CCO|WHO WANT TO BUILD A STRONGER AND
20101203181733.000|20101203181735.000|CCO|MORE STABLE AND MORE PROSPEROUS 
20101203181735.000|20101203181737.000|CCO|AFGHANISTAN.
20101203181737.000|20101203181739.000|CCO|I DON'T NEED TO TELL YOU, THIS 
20101203181739.000|20101203181741.000|CCO|IS A TOUGH FIGHT.
20101203181741.000|20101203181743.500|CCO|I JUST CAME FROM THE MEDICAL 
20101203181743.500|20101203181746.000|CCO|UNIT AND SAW OUR WOUNDED 
20101203181746.000|20101203181748.500|CCO|WARRIORS, PINNED SOME PURPLE 
20101203181748.500|20101203181751.000|CCO|HEARTS.
20101203181751.000|20101203181756.000|CCO|I JUST TALKED TO THE PLATOON 
20101203181756.000|20101203181801.000|CCO|THAT LOST SIX OF THEIR BUDDIES 
20101203181801.000|20101203181803.000|CCO|IN A SENSELESS ACT OF VIOLENCE.
20101203181803.000|20101203181805.000|CCO|THIS IS TOUGH BUSINESS.
20101203181805.000|20101203181807.000|CCO|PROGRESS COMES SLOW.
20101203181807.000|20101203181809.000|CCO|THERE ARE GOING TO BE DIFFICULT 
20101203181809.000|20101203181811.000|CCO|DAYS AHEAD.
20101203181811.000|20101203181814.333|CCO|PROGRESS COMES AT A HIGH PRICE.
20101203181814.333|20101203181817.667|CCO|SO MANY OF YOU HAVE STOOD BEFORE
20101203181817.667|20101203181821.000|CCO|THE SOLEMN BATTLE FOR US.
20101203181821.000|20101203181831.000|CCO|DISPLAY OF BOOTS, A RIFLE, A 
20101203181831.000|20101203181833.500|CCO|HELMET AND SAID GOOD-BYE TO A 
20101203181833.500|20101203181836.000|CCO|FALLEN COMRAD.
20101203181836.000|20101203181838.500|CCO|THERE ARE FEW DAYS WHEN I DON'T 
20101203181838.500|20101203181841.000|CCO|SIGN A LETTER TO A MILITARY 
20101203181841.000|20101203181843.000|CCO|FAMILY EXPRESSING OUR NATION'S 
20101203181843.000|20101203181845.000|CCO|GRATITUDE AND GRIEF AT THEIR 
20101203181845.000|20101203181847.000|CCO|PROFOUND SACRIFICE.
20101203181847.000|20101203181849.000|CCO|IN THIS HOLIDAY SEASON, OUR 
20101203181849.000|20101203181851.000|CCO|THOUGHTS AND PRAYERS ARE WITH 
20101203181851.000|20101203181852.667|CCO|THOSE WHO HAVE LOST LOVED ONES.
20101203181852.667|20101203181854.333|CCO|THE FATHER OR MOTHER, THE SON OR
20101203181854.333|20101203181856.000|CCO|DAUGHTER, THE BROTHER OR SISTER 
20101203181856.000|20101203181857.667|CCO|OR FRIEND WHO IS NOT COMING 
20101203181857.667|20101203181859.333|CCO|HOME.
20101203181859.333|20101203181901.000|CCO|WE KNOW THAT THEIR MEMORIES WILL
20101203181901.000|20101203181903.500|CCO|NEVER BE FORGOTTEN AND THAT

20101203181906.000|20101203181908.500|CCO|OF OUR NATION.

20101203181911.000|20101203181912.667|CCO|THE MEN AND WOMEN OF THE UNITED

20101203182644.333|20101203182646.000|CCO|WRITES.

20101203182711.000|20101203182713.000|CCO|NATION THAT WE ARE BECAUSE WE DO
20101203182713.000|20101203182715.000|CCO|WHAT'S EASY.

20101203182717.000|20101203182719.000|CCO|GROWN STRONGER AND WE REMAIN THE

20101203182742.429|20101203182743.857|CCO|>>> PRESIDENT OBAMA AT BAGRAM 
20101203182743.857|20101203182745.286|CCO|AIR FORCE BASE TELLING THE 
20101203182745.286|20101203182746.714|CCO|TROOPS THEY HAVE MADE PROGRESS.
20101203182746.714|20101203182748.143|CCO|THEY ARE ON OFFENSE, NOT GOING 
20101203182748.143|20101203182749.571|CCO|TO PLAY DEFENSE.
20101203182749.571|20101203182751.000|CCO|THERE ARE FEWER AND FEWER AREAS 
20101203182751.000|20101203182753.000|CCO|UNDER TALIBAN CONTROL.
